title: Media Advisory:  Colorado and Virginia Earthquake Press Conference

und.value:
WHAT: U.S. Geological Survey seismologists answer questions about the magnitude 5.3 felt in and around Trinidad, Colo., and the magnitude 5.8 in Central Va. that was felt across the Eastern Seaboard today.

WHO: USGS seismologists from the USGS Earthquake Information Center in Golden, Colo.
Harley Benz, Scientist-in-Charge, USGS Earthquake Information Center
David Wald, USGS Geophysicist
Tony Crone, USGS Geophysicist

WHEN: 6:15 p.m. EST, 4:15 p.m. MDT and 3:15 p.m. PDT

WHERE: Reporters may call 1-800-988-9538 and use access code 4378298# to access the live teleconference.

The latest event information may be found online:

  • Virginia
  • Trinidad

Citizens who felt the earthquake can go online and report their observations on the USGS Did You Feel It? website.
